title: Server Problems?
body: Just wondering if anyone else is experiencing server lag, every player in my current game keeps getting attempting to reconnect. Was playing with low ping not minutes before. {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Tried to play a ranked game and it just was stuck on "Match is about to begin" quit and re-logged and it says I've started a game but can't reconnect
I've tried to re-log in like 1000000000 times OMG.{{item:3070}}
still unable to connect, can someone post when they connect
Did a speedtest and had a 14ms ping with 112 download. Ping keeps fluctuating in game between 14 and 300 ping. It's becoming a constant struggle.
Soo annoying!

same problem here. dc'ed midway through game, got one small lag spike a few minutes before. we were going to win too and get into my promos for gold 5. oh well. I'm clicking Retry in the hope I re-enter first and carry 1v0.
is ranked back?
Just logged back in. Seems like it was a loss prevented.

replies.poster: A m ü l ê t
replies.body:
''Network Operations – 3 minutes ago
We are aware of issues that involves games not starting related to ISP connectivity and we are investigating.''
YA FIXED the match you were in got prevented but wont show in history but you still dont lose

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce

yay didn't lose Lp
Loss prevented i assume?
Games not even coming up in history.
Yea when they fix it though
rank is down and they dont count the game
my game just got closed.. it was ended.. so redoing que to see if its still down
my game ended
It's back up, reset servers seems. No ranked queue.
Should be, since it's happening to everyone.
Got dced as I was about to spike with {{item:3031}}  and carry -.- {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Apparently people can spectate games, just no one is permitted to play

well tbh the servers are down and the tech support are sleeping.. they probly got the alarm call and are now walking into the office to see about the fix for the issue.. maybe there is a big red button they hit to reboot the servers lmao.. would be funny.. anywho there is more to servers then just going BANG its fixed.. gota find the issue see how it was caused and find a way to stop it from happening again.. thats all they can do atm. 

neway hope riot can fix this issue.. 

I have done my CCNA and know about servers, networking and technical issues.. hopefully its not down for long.
so um if I get a a ban for this %%%% -_-
I honestly think the saddest part here is that their service status says everything is fine.........servers go down and there's no word from riot and they say everything is fine :D.
Yer they are certainly taking the piss. Fire the oce server people and get someone who knows what they are doing.
Me and a mate are playing and we both got booted at the same time at the start of a match. We left to see if we could rejoin but nothing. Anyone know anything at this point?

thats exactly what happened to me ..just got into game ..nice and fast ..then i place one trap as cait in a bush ..and "attempting to reconnect" happend i closed server thought it was my internet ..then i just cant re join
bump for fix{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}
are they fixing it?
Cant connect told me my firewall maybe blocking it so i turned off the firewall and found that it said the same thing. Trust riot to open a server in oce lol.
same for me, kicked out and now cant reconnect.
anyone know how to fix it...PROMOTE!! WINNING!!{{champion:42}}

>

our eve is the only good eve i hv seen s5

I was in champ select soon as it went to champ select i crashed and im guessing everyone did to because everyone was stuck on a certain percentage promos gona be losttttt
i feel your pain
This is taking them ages to fix >.>
yea same
What happends on server now?
just got booted from a game where everyone dc... hope I don't leaver over this %%%%
yeah i can't get back into my game right now, gg elo.
is happening to me too
someone put a nuclear bomb at their server to deal tons of phreaking damage like  {{item:3078}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3078}}  to it. So our games were crashed :)
Yeah same happened here, lan party destroyed :c
Yep, 2 teamates DC'd a close game then I DC'd a few minutes later, what a load of %%%%.
Stuck just before loading screen in champ select lobby.
3 guys on my team dced and one on the other,then everyone. I'm at a net cafe and its happening to everyone on OCE
i can't believe i'm going to get a "leaver" for this
dc here as well
